name: Web Copy & Headlines
description: Create compelling headlines and web copy for blogs, sales pages, and marketing content

questions.question: What type of web content are you creating?
questions.description: Different content types require different copy strategies

questions.question: What's the main topic or subject?
questions.description: Be specific about what the content covers

questions.question: What style of headline do you prefer?
questions.description: Different styles work better for different audiences and goals

questions.question: Who is your target audience?
questions.description: Choose from common audiences or enter your own custom audience

questions.question: What's your primary goal for this copy?
questions.description: Your goal will influence the copy strategy

questions.question: What tone should the copy have?
questions.description: The tone should match your brand and audience

questions.question: Do you have a length preference?
questions.description: Different platforms have different optimal lengths

questions.question: How many variations would you like?
questions.description: Choose how many different versions of your prompt to generate (3-20)

templates.name: Web Copy Headline
templates.description: Create compelling headlines for web content
templates.template: Create a {tone} {headline_style} headline about {topic} that {goal_description}. Target audience: {target_audience}. {length_instruction}. {variations_instruction}

examples.output: Create a professional benefit-focused headline about productivity tips that drives clicks and engagement. Target audience: busy professionals. Keep it under 60 characters

examples.description: Compelling blog post title that drives clicks
